description:
Frank is a movie director that specializes in Pikachu based movies. He has been together with Pikachu his whole life, so he can`t tell stories while leaving out Pikachu. During his childhood, he was sick a lot, but Pikachu always cheered him up. When he cried, Pikachu were by his side.
When he was about Ash Ketchum`s age, he traveled together with his Pikachu. His Pikachu where also there when he got married and when his wife died. His Pikachu have always given him many smiles and that`s why he makes movies, so he can give children all over the world the ability to smile.
name: Frank
